item.title: Media review: The Limits of Realism
item.description: I am currently trying to finish up two long form writeups, but would like to update this blog more often, so I will start a new category: media reviews. Short to not so short summaries of what I liked about a given piece of media - books, movies, papers, YouTube videos etc. Without further ado, let’s start. I have just finished listening to the latest video of Kraut which both introduces and attempts to debunk the internal relations framework of realism, i.
